original_text:
A drought against her waters,
    that they may be dried up!
For it is a land of images,
    and they are mad over idols.
korean_text: 가뭄이 물 위에 내리어 그것을 말리리니 이는 그 땅이 조각한 신상의 땅이요 그들은 무서운 것을 보고 실성하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: that they may be dried up!
For it is a land of images
and they are mad over idols
